connections.title: Customs and taxes
connections.description: I have an issue with customs

content:
Our warranty and refund policy can be found here.

Legal document
What do you need help with?

connections.title: I want to return an order
I want to exchange an item / I got the wrong Item
I need an invoice for my company

content:
1. Please contact the courier service or local post that handled the delivery for an explanation for why your package is damaged.

We would suggest taking photos of your package that will clearly document its status. 

2. Sometimes the package is opened by customs. Unfortunately, we can't do anything to prevent customs from doing so as it is within their legal powers.

Customs usually labels such packages with the information that it was opened by them. When contacting the courier service or local post, they should also be able to inform you whether this happened.

text: I want to exchange an item / I got the wrong item
content: Please check if the contents of the package reflect the contents of your purchase by checking your order email.

text: I want to return an order
content:
Please bear in mind that refunds for returned orders can be claimed only when all necessary conditions have been fulfilled, and you will not receive a full refund.

Orders can be returned for refund only within 15 days from the day your package was received. More details can be found here.

1. If the Trezor box is not open, we will refund the cost of the Trezor product(s) once it has returned to us, minus the shipping costs you paid for this order to be both sent to you and returned to us. 

2. If the Trezor box is open, we will refund the cost of the Trezor product(s) minus 18 EUR for each unit (because of testing, refurbishing, and repackaging) and minus the shipping cost you paid for this order once it has returned. You are also responsible for the shipping cost of sending the returned product(s) back to us.

If you ordered more products in one parcel, you can also return only part of the order.

For example, from an order with two Trezor One White, you may return only one Trezor One White if you decide you don't want two. 

If you paid with Bitcoin, please also read the conditions for Bitcoin refunds.

If you fulfill the necessary conditions and still want to return your order, please submit a ticket here.
Here you can find our Manual.

text: I need an invoice for my company
content:
The invoice is sent to the email you used to create the order, once your package has shipped. 

Please check your spam folder to see if the email with the invoice ended up there.

If you were not able to find your invoice with these suggestions, please submit a ticket here.

connections.title: My package is being held by the customs

content: Select a topic below.
Please verify if your order is in “Shipped” status. Check the email account that you used to place the order on our Trezor Official Shop.

connections.title: I want to check the status/location of my package

content: More information about common issues with Trezor Shop.

connections.title: Issues with login / a wrong password

text: Issues with login / a wrong password
content:
We suggest checking whether you created other e-shop accounts under different emails.

Restoring the password

To restore your password, please use this link and click on the “Recover your password” button located on this website.

In the next step you’ll need to enter an email address where the instructions for setting a new password will be sent and then hit the “Reset my password” button.

If you didn’t receive the email with the instructions, please check your spam folder and whether you entered your email address correctly.

If you haven't received the confirmation email, please double check that you have successfully purchased your order. 

Also have a look in your 'SPAM' folder.
Click here to learn how to make a successful payment in our official Trezor shop.

connections.description: I want to get a better price

content:
Here you can find a list of our official resellers.

Trezor Official resellers.

We also have official stores on Amazon US, Amazon DE and Newegg (Trezor One, Trezor Model T).

Note: Devices bought from resellers have their own warranty depending on the reseller's conditions.
Select which payment method you have issues with it.

connections.title: I'm facing issues with a credit card payment
I'm facing issues with a crypto payment

content:
A usable promo code must fulfill these criteria:

1) The promo code needs to be active - We release promo codes during specific dates or events, always available for a limited period of time or number of uses. This detailed information is presented on our blog or in the newsletter.

Please subscribe to our newsletter through our form that is located at the bottom of our website, and check out our blog to stay on top of the news!

2) The promo code needs to be valid - Only our own released promo codes can be used. 

Unfortunately, we cannot apply a discount retroactively.

We believe the device is worth every penny of its original price, so we hope you won't feel too bad about buying it for full price like many other satisfied customers have.

If you wish to order Trezors in bulk, please continue here.

Note: This special discount is only for ordering 50 devices or more.

When an invalid VAT ID is entered, you will see in the e-shop interface that it was not accepted by our system.

It is possible that our system didn’t reflect a valid VAT ID (it could be too new or there could be a different problem with the database). 

You can check the validity of your VAT ID. If your VAT ID is not registered (listed) here, we can't accept it in our e-shop.

If you’re sure that you’ve entered a correct (valid) VAT ID and it is registered in the European database, please submit a ticket here.

We have 3 options for shipping. The items will be dispatched within 2 days of the time of purchase.

The options could vary depending on your country.

DHL express shipping

DHL shipping is a professional and fast delivery service. Your order is fully trackable, and this information is available for at least 30 days after the package has been handed to the DHL courier. This shipping method is not available in Russia.

Delivery time may vary between two to five business days (it may be delayed by the customs procedure).

The package tracking information is available for 90 days.

UPS shipping

UPS shipping is a professional and fast delivery service that is currently available only for the United Kingdom.

Delivery time may vary between one to three business days (it may be delayed by the customs procedure).

The package tracking information is available for 120 days.

Standard worldwide shipping

The standard shipping option is only available in EU countries and Russia. Its trackability is limited.

Delivery time may vary between five days to six weeks depending on your location and your national post service.

A parcel sent via standard shipping can be traced here until it leaves the country of origin. After that, it can be traced on the website of the postal service in your country, if available.
You can read more about what's in the package of Trezor devices.

Not sure your device is genuine?

If you are concerned that your Trezor is not a genuine product from our company, please refer to this blog article, where you will find information about how to distinguish between an original and a fake Trezor.

You can also check out the Trezor packaging timeline.

A Trezor box is protected by the seals, and it is also virtually impossible to open the device without breaking it (the case is sealed using ultrasound), so you would see right away if someone had tampered with it.

All Trezor devices are distributed without a firmware software, so you need to install it for your first use. If a firmware has already been installed, then that means someone used the device before you.

The bootloader verifies the firmware signature. The device only runs if the firmware is correctly signed by SatoshiLabs.

Our Bootloader software is write protected, as the JTAG is disabled. The MCU is safeguarded by the Memory Protection Unit, which ensures that you're using the valid firmware version signed by us. If not, then a warning message appears on the Trezor display.

Because the recovery seed is generated during Trezor setup, there is no default seed; you will generate the seed for yourself.

If you encounter any Trezor device with preinstalled firmware, but it was purchased as a new device, please let us know.

notes:
Tady ve formu dodat: Kde si koupil Trezor, nahrani screenu - foto krabicky z obou stran + foto hologramu
Popripade nahrani faktury (pdf).

content:
Lastly, check out our official list of resellers. If they are on the list, it lowers the chances that the device is fake.

Trezor Official Resellers.

We also have official stores on Amazon US, Amazon DE and Newegg (Trezor One, Trezor Model T).

There are three possible types of tracking IDs according to the shipping method you’ve chosen for your order.

Types of tracking IDs

Standard shipping: 13 characters (combination ID [letters and numbers] that starts with RR and ends with CZ)

DHL shipping: 1234567890 (ten digit ID)

UPS shipping: 18 characters (combination ID [letters and numbers] that always starts with 1Z)

Tracking portals

Standard shipping

DHL

UPS

Note: Orders sent via Standard shipping can also be traced on the website of the postal service in your country, if available.

connections.title: I want to change the shipping address
I missed my package delivery window
I haven't received a tracking number yet
The status/location of my package hasn't changed in a long time
Customs in my country has my package

content:
If the tracking says 'delivered' and you haven't received the package, contact DHL or UPS support first.

For standard shipping, please reach out to us below.

text: I missed my package delivery window
content: If you have missed your parcel delivery window, most likely the package is being sent back to us. We can arrange to have it resent, or request to change the address for the delivery.

text: I want to change the shipping address
content:
If you want to change your shipping address, and your package has not shipped yet, please proceed to the form.

Note: When your order has the status 'shipped' the support team won't be able to help you, unless the package returns back.

This situation has several explanations.

1. You’re entering an incorrect tracking ID

2. Your order hasn't been entered in the tracking database of the respective service yet

If you chose standard shipping for your order, the package may have left the Czech Republic, and is now untraceable until the destination country's postal service claims it.

After leaving the country of origin, the parcel travels to a foreign country where it is accepted at customs services. This is where most delays happen. The delivery will appear in the customer's post tracking system only after it has been released by customs.

text: Delivered status but no package in your possession
content:
If the tracking says 'delivered' and you haven't received the package, try to contact DHL & UPS support first.

For standard shipping delivered status, please contact us below.

text: I haven't received a tracking number yet
content:
Then your order probably hasn't shipped. Please bear in mind that paid orders are processed within 48 hours during business days, if not stated otherwise by a notification when creating your order. 

If it's been more than 3 days, please continue to the form.
We ship mostly worldwide. When selecting a shipping method with your order on our Official Trezor Shop you can see if your country is there.

connections.title: Didn't find your country on the list? Continue to the form.

notes: Tady udelat form: zemi kde chce shippovat

content:
Our privacy policy be found here.

Legal document.

Customs duties and taxes are always calculated based on the local laws of the destination country. Please contact your local authorities in order to get an estimated customs fee.

For your information, the product will be shipped from the European Union as a USB device with HS code 847180. The total declared value for the customs department is the full price of the order, including shipping.
Since we're subject to EU law and we do have an ongoing official contract with DHL, UPS, and the Czech Post, we're obligated to print out the full price on the package.

We are sorry, but customs duties or related taxes are not paid by us. 

It is mentioned in our e-shop when you're confirming the conditions (otherwise the order could not be created):

"I understand that I am responsible for paying customs duties, local taxes, and other related fees, if applicable." 

If you refuse to pay the customs and related taxes, the package will be sent back to us. Once it is returned, we can:

1) Resend the package, but you will need to pay the shipping cost again

2) Refund the price of your order minus the shipping costs

If you want to refuse the package even after the information above, please let us know via the form in the following step.

Please verify that your bitcoin transaction has already been confirmed on the blockchain.

We recommend using one of the blockchain browsers where you need to type the destination address provided by our e-shop when paying with Bitcoin.

Suggested blockchain explorers: 

https://blockchain.info

https://btc-explorer.trezor.io

If you have used a Globee option as form of payment. Please continue to the form.

Double-check that your bank is allowing your payment to us. Contact them about the payment if you're not successful.

Double order: You may have created multiple orders by accident. Please check whether the cancellation notification is related to a different order that was not paid for.

text: My package hasn't changed its status/location for a long period
content: If your package is stuck in one location for a long time it could mean it's being checked by customs, or it's lost.
Customs hold my package and I need your assistance.
